programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A penguin longs to follow in the footsteps of his hero, legendary surfer Big Z, and leaves his Antarctic home to compete in a prestigious tournament on a tropical island. Unfortunately the waves in this warmer climate are much bigger than anything he has experienced - and the egotistical reigning champion does not take kindly to competition. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: An incompetent scientist finally invents something that works - a machine that turns water into food. When the device gets launched into the atmosphere, it has a strange effect on his town's weather, causing giant meals to fall from the sky to the delight of the residents - until it gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: A mad scientist kidnaps a beagle to use as a guinea pig in his deranged experiments. But an accidental injection leaves the mutt with awe-inspiring superpowers, which he uses to foil the deranged inventor's plans to take over a city. Comedy adventure, starring Peter Dinklage and James Belushi, and featuring the voices of Jason Lee and Amy Adams(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement(n)

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld(n)

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen(n)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg(n)

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: Louis & Luca - The Big Cheese Race
programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen(n)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg(n)

programme.title: Kubo and the Two Strings
programme.desc: A young boy embarks on an epic quest when he inadvertently summons vengeful spirits from his past. Bafta-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson and Matthew McConaughey(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: An evil druid wreaks havoc on ancient Britain, determined to wipe out the Celtic people. A young warrior who has been driven into exile joins forces with a hermit wizard to stop his reign of terror and save their people from annihilation. Fantasy adventure, starring Kirk Barker and Stefan Butler(n)

programme.title: ID2: Shadwell Army
programme.desc: A police officer goes undercover as a football hooligan to bring far-right extremists to justice. Sequel to the 1995 crime thriller, starring Simon Rivers, Linus Roache, Paul Popplewell and Andy Rush

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role

programme.title: United 93
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, recreating the events on the fourth plane hijacked in the September 11 attacks in 2001. The passengers were by now aware of the destruction at the World Trade Centre and the Pentagon. Realising their plane was about to be used for a similar purpose, they set out to wrest control from the terrorists. Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Christian Clemenson, Trish Gates, David Alan Basche and Cheyenne Jackson

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a ruthless fisherman, and races against the clock to save his wife and son. Drama, starring Eion Bailey, Bethany Joy Lenz and Barkhad Abdi

programme.title: Desierto
programme.desc: A group of immigrants hoping to make it across the US-Mexico border are targeted by a deranged, gun-wielding vigilante. Thriller, starring Gael Garcia Bernal and Jeffrey Dean Morgan

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: A heroic firefighter is plunged into the world of international terrorism when his wife and child are killed in a horrific attack. Disillusioned with the progress of the official investigation, he decides to take on the villains himself and heads for Colombia on a dangerous mission of revenge, determined to bring the perpetrators to justice. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas and Cliff Curtis

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A crook double-crosses his partners in crime, a betrayal that leaves their friend and mentor dead. One year later, they regroup and come up with a daring plan to exact revenge on the traitor and reclaim their ill-gotten gains. Crime thriller inspired by the 1969 movie, starring Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green and Donald Sutherland

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage

programme.title: Undercover Hooligan
programme.desc: Suspended cop Michael Clarke is tasked with infiltrating an infamous London gang and bringing down its leader. British crime drama, starring Kris Johnson and Patrick Connolly

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: A disgraced soccer star jailed for assaulting two policemen is persuaded by the prison authorities to form a football team of inmates to take on the guards. Unfortunately, whipping his fellow prisoners into shape proves a tricky proposition. Comedy drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Jason Statham, David Hemmings and Jason Flemyng

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh

programme.title: Detour
programme.desc: A troubled LA law student drunkenly commits to a revenge plot against his stepfather. Crime thriller, starring Tye Sheridan, Emory Cohen and Bel Powley(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean Archer captures terrorist Castor Troy, the man who killed his son. While Troy is in a coma, Archer has the crook's face surgically grafted onto his own so he can go undercover and locate a bomb planted somewhere in Los Angeles. But then Troy regains consciousness - and in turn takes on Archer's identity. John Woo's action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Travolta, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon and Dominique Swain(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos(n)

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger(n)

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg(n)

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter Two
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane(n)

programme.title: Within
programme.desc: A family moves to a peaceful suburban neighbourhood to start a new life, but the dark history of their seemingly perfect home soon emerges. Horror, starring Michael Vartan, Erin Moriarty and Nadine Velazquez

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: A small California town is infiltrated by sinister alien vegetable pods from outer space, which start to clone the residents and replace them with emotionless replicas. A local doctor realises something bizarre is going on and sets out to investigate - but is not prepared for what he finds. Don Siegel's sci-fi thriller, with Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter and Carolyn Jones

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: A gang of interplanetary smugglers is pursued by a government assassin searching for a teenage girl who has taken shelter on board their spaceship. Gifted with extraordinary telepathic powers, she has uncovered a secret that threatens the political stability of the universe - and the ruling forces will stop at nothing to ensure it stays buried. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series Firefly, starring Nathan Fillion, Summer Glau and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes

programme.title: The Neighbour
programme.desc: When a Mississippi man comes home to find his girlfriend missing, he soon discovers the disturbing truth about his secretive neighbour. Horror thriller, starring Josh Stewart, Bill Engvall and Alex Essoe

programme.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
programme.desc: A small California town is infiltrated by sinister alien vegetable pods from outer space, which start to clone the residents and replace them with emotionless replicas. A local doctor realises something bizarre is going on and sets out to investigate - but is not prepared for what he finds. Don Siegel's sci-fi thriller, with Kevin McCarthy, Dana Wynter and Carolyn Jones

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A child psychologist, disheartened after the suicide of a former patient, takes on the case of a terrified boy haunted by ghostly apparitions, and tries to help him discover what the spirits want from him. M Night Shyamalan's supernatural thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette and Olivia Williams

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Answer The Call
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy and other cast members of the rebooted Ghostbusters discuss the blockbusting 2016 comedy

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: A mysterious shape-shifting alien kills and impersonates its victims on an Antarctic research base manned by a crew of American scientists. The researchers face the ordeal of stopping the creature from making its way to civilisation - but are in danger of jeopardising the task as mounting paranoia turns them against each other. John Carpenter's sci-fi horror remake, starring Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, TK Carter, Keith David and Richard Dysart

programme.title: 2018 Preview Show
programme.desc: Alex Zane looks ahead to the biggest and best films hitting the silver screen in 2018(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara(n)

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen(n)

programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: Anthology of five scary tales paying homage to the cult American EC comics of the 1950s and based on stories by Stephen King, who also makes a cameo appearance. Horror, starring Leslie Nielsen, Carrie Nye and Hal Holbrook(n)

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A devoutly Christian Scottish police officer travels to a remote island to investigate the disappearance of a missing girl. As his investigations are disrupted at every turn, the detective is horrified to see the population have embraced an ancient pagan lifestyle, and begins to fear they may intend to sacrifice the child in an occult ritual. Horror, starring Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee and Britt Ekland(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua(n)

programme.title: Stardust

Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jensen Ames is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to Terminal Island Prison, a facility that broadcasts the highly profitable Death Race, a high-octane event where convicts battle to the death in customised cars. When a popular driver dies, crooked prison warden Hennessey persuades Ames to take his place, claiming he will be released if he is victorious. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jason Statham, Joan Allen, Ian McShane and Tyrese Gibson

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A political advisor's career ends in disaster when she ends up at the centre of a major scandal. She is lured out of retirement to help the embattled president of Bolivia to get re-elected, but finds the opposition is being assisted by an old rival, who uses every dirty trick in the book to wreck her campaign. Comedy drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton and Anthony Mackie

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black

programme.title: Red Dog: The Early Years
programme.desc: A young boy shipped off to his grandad's remote cattle station finds friendship and adventure with a one-of-a-kind dog. Family drama, starring Levi Miller and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A doctor discovers a dead American football player died as the result of brain trauma inflicted on the field. He tries to raise awareness of the danger and provide greater protection from injury for players, but finds himself up against a powerful institution determined to bury the risk. Fact-based drama, starring Will Smith, Alec Baldwin and Albert Brooks

Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson

programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle(n)

programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare(n)

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A hard-drinking San Francisco cop investigates the case of a man murdered with an ice-pick, but his normally well-honed intuition starts letting him down as he falls for the sultry and manipulative chief suspect, the victim's former girlfriend. Thriller from director Paul Verhoeven, starring Sharon Stone, Michael Douglas, George Dzundza and Jeanne Tripplehorn

programme.title: The House of Magic
programme.desc: A stray cat wanders into a magician's mansion, and finds it is full of strange gadgets. The illusionist allows him to stay, to the annoyance of his other pets, but the cat proves an invaluable addition to the group when their owner's scheming nephew plots to take the house for himself. Animated adventure, with the voices of Murray Blue and Doug Stone

programme.title: Krull
programme.desc: Villainous monster the Beast invades a magical land, where his henchmen kidnap a princess the night before her wedding. Her fiance sets out in search of a mythical weapon to rescue her, aided by a band of thieves, a wise old hermit, a bumbling wizard and a mysterious Cyclops. Fantasy adventure, starring Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis, Robbie Coltrane and Liam Neeson

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A teenager discovers he is the last in a long line of warriors destined to defend the world from dark forces. His duty now is to embark on a perilous journey through time to recover the six parts of a powerful mystical artefact and ensure it is returned to safe hands. Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood screenwriter takes a job at a small university, planning to exploit his position as a local celebrity and do as little work as possible. His cynical outlook begins to change when he falls for a single mother working toward her degree, while a talented pupil makes him consider what he wants from his life. Romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Marisa Tomei, Allison Janney and JK Simmons

programme.title: Chronicle
programme.desc: Three teenagers develop superhuman abilities after exploring a mysterious cave. They delight in experimenting with what they are able to do, documenting their actions on video. However, one of them lets his new-found power go to his head, and as he begins using it to evil ends, the others realise only they can stop him. Sci-fi thriller, starring Dane DeHaan, Alex Russell and Michael B Jordan

programme.title: Three Billboards Interview Special
programme.desc: Writer-director Martin McDonagh and star Sam Rockwell talk about making the comedy-drama about one woman's unconventional fight for justice

programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his squad of retired operatives for a vital mission. A devastatingly powerful new weapon has been stolen, and it falls to Frank's team to retrieve it - which means facing lethal assassins, terrorists and corrupt government officials out to steal the device. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren and John Malkovich

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: Weedy youngster Greg finds his plans for a lazy school holiday ruined when his mother bans video games and his father organises a series of family activities. When he finds out a girl he likes is working at a country club, he tells his family he has a summer job there as an excuse to spend time with her - but struggles to keep up the deception. Family comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Steve Zahn

programme.title: Three Billboards Interview Special
programme.desc: Writer-director Martin McDonagh and star Sam Rockwell talk about making the comedy-drama about one woman's unconventional fight for justice

programme.title: The Indian in the Cupboard
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy is given an old cupboard and a toy Iroquois Indian for his birthday - but when he puts the figure inside the cupboard, he is astonished to see it come to life. He repeats the experiment with more of his toys, and realises he is creating real people - and is responsible for their wellbeing. Children's fantasy, with Hal Scardino, Litefoot and Steve Coogan

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: An elite military team is nearly wiped out after a terrorist organisation replaces the US president with an imposter and has them declared enemies of the state. The handful of survivors seek the help of their original leader in avenging their fallen comrades. Action adventure sequel, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ray Park and Bruce Willis

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Premiere. Horror prequel set a few years before the haunting of the Lambert family, that reveals how gifted psychic Elise Rainier reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead in order to help a teenage girl who has been targeted by a dangerous supernatural entity. Starring Dermot Mulroney, Stefanie Scott and Lin Shaye

programme.title: Mr Nice
programme.desc: Biopic of 1970s marijuana trafficker Howard Marks, whose inventive smuggling schemes made him a huge success in the drug trade, as well as leading to dealings with both the IRA and British Intelligence. However, his efforts to crack the American market look set to bring about his downfall. Starring Rhys Ifans, Chloe Sevigny and David Thewlis(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox(n)

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: Rodney the robot heads for the city, hoping to find an investor for his latest invention. Instead, he winds up clashing with an evil business mogul intent on stopping a manufacturer from making spare parts needed for ageing robots - so Rodney teams up with assorted rusty rejects to put the matter right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Robin Williams, Greg Kinnear and Amanda Bynes(n)

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A neurotic worker ant passes himself off as a soldier to impress a princess. However, he provokes a jealously ambitious general with an accidental act of heroism - so he and his beloved decide to flee the brutal colony and go in search of the promised land of Insectopia. Animated comedy, with the voices of Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman and Sylvester Stallone(n)

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy(n)

programme.title: The Core

As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planet's surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls(n)

Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Sadler, Franco Nero and William Atherton(n)

programme.title: Savages

Oliver Stone's crime drama, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively, Salma Hayek and Benicio Del Toro(n)

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Providence
programme.sub-title: All Good Dogs Go to Heaven.
programme.desc: Jim cares for a dying dog that is pining for its owner, Joanie meets a celebrity and Syd attempts to save a teenage girl's life

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: A reporter interviews a suspect in a serial killer case whom she believes to be innocent - but he turns out to be guilty and her actions give him the chance to kill again. Years later, she tries to put her mistakes behind her, only to find that somebody wants her dead. Mystery, starring Melissa George and Ryan Scott Greene

programme.title: Living with the Enemy
programme.desc: A woman marries a widowed billionaire after a whirlwind romance, but is shocked to learn his first wife was murdered by kidnappers and that she will have to learn to live with elaborate security measures as a result. However, the more she gets to know her husband, the more she begins to suspect he is concealing the truth about her predecessor's fate. Thriller, with Sarah Lancaster and Mark Humphrey

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Emma falls in love with an Australian soldier. Meanwhile, the Harte empire continues to expand. Conclusion of the drama, starring Deborah Kerr

programme.title: The Flowers of War
programme.desc: An American drifter arrives in Nanjing in 1937, just as Japanese forces invade. Hiding out in a Western-run church, he poses as a priest, but ends up adopting his role and providing shelter for orphans and courtesans as carnage unfolds in the city. Drama, starring Christian Bale and Ni Ni. In Nanjing dialect, English, Japanese, Mandarin and Shanghainese

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A charismatic newcomer challenges the sheriff in an election, while Grandpa tries to have a captured wild horse set free

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After finding himself unable to shoot a turkey while on a hunting trip, John-Boy displays his courage by saving his father's life

programme.title: Unlikely Angel
programme.desc: An egotistical singer dies and goes to Heaven, but is refused entry unless she can prove herself to be less self-centred. Returning to Earth, she finds a job as nanny to a bereaved family - but all her good turns seem to backfire. Fantasy, starring Dolly Parton, Brian Kerwin, Roddy McDowall and Maria Del Mar

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Little House in the Big Woods.
programme.desc: Part one of three. Charles Ingalls decides to uproot his wife and daughters from their Wisconsin home to claim a new parcel of land in Kansas. Adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books about her family, starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Native Americans approach the house while Charles is away, terrifying Laura and Mary, while Caroline is delighted to meet new neighbours Mr and Mrs Scott. Fire threatens the Ingalls' home and Charles has difficulty bartering. Adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books, starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles is attacked by a mountain lion, while the growing number of Native Americans establishing camps nearby has the family feeling threatened. Conclusion of the three-part adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books about her family starting a new life in Kansas. Starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A beautiful woman arouses the ardour of three rival suitors in 19th-century rural Dorset and, having flirted and toyed with their affections, she chooses to marry a caddish, gambling soldier - a decision that leads to a sequence of harrowing events. John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura holds Doc Baker responsible for her son's death, causing the rest of the town to reject him(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter is jealous when her son Jason makes friends with lonely newcomer Ruthy Leland. Vera Miles guest stars(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney eagerly anticipates taking her relationship with dishy Dr Marcus to the next level, but bargains without his deep, dark secret. Jim and Robbie cook up a plan to prevent a pig mascot becoming the first course at a company dinner and Joanie considers marketing her chowder(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney becomes increasingly involved in the life of a troublesome teenager who has run away from her foster home, while Joanie receives overtures from a major food retailer eager to market her chowder(n)

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.desc: A meteorite lands in the Baldwin sisters' recipe room, causing quite a stir among the locals who believe it to be a heaven-sent omen of hope(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A minister comes to stay with the Waltons, but his presence soon sparks off all manner of religious ructions(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children prevent an injured orphan from killing a raccoon and take him under their wing - but soon wonder whether they have made the right decision(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan Smith, an angel, has been sent to help people on Earth. For his first assignment, he befriends residents at Havencrest retirement home and its administrator Leslie Gordon. The first of a two-part pilot of the drama , starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan needs to take Mark into his confidence and reveal he is an angel in order to complete his first assignment(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of the fairy tale set in post-war Rome, following the story of a young woman with a gift for music who is forced to work as a maid in her stepmother's hotel. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers and Frank Crudele(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Concluding part of the adaptation of the fairy tale set in post-war Rome, following the story of a young woman with a gift for music who is forced to work as a maid in her stepmother's hotel. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers and Frank Crudele(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Part one of two. Bella Dubois, daughter of a merchant, is obliged to take a post as a servant at a castle as her father cannot pay his debts to its owner Prince Leon. programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Part two of two. Concluding the fantasy drama, starring Alessandro Preziosi, Blanca Suarez, Giusy Buscemi and Lea Bosco(n)

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: Part one of two. Re-telling of Shakespeare's classic tale of love and rivalry. Martino Rivas and Alessandra Mastronardi star as the young lovers from two feuding families in Renaissance Verona(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars

programme.title: Frank's Northern Southern Express
programme.desc: Frank starts a booming import-export business. Fiona considers moving into her own place after Ford shows her a side of Chicago she's never seen. Meanwhile, Lip interviews new sponsors, Ian confronts a pastor trying to "pray the gay away" and Debbie deals with being unemployed while looking for a way to afford school and raise Franny

programme.title: The Flesh Prince
programme.desc: More than just food is served up at LA's most exclusive members-only erotic club. Tonight, all fantasies are on the table... literally. Series premiere

programme.title: Mark's Lunch & Two Cups of Coffee.
programme.desc: Bridgette matches with her estranged Dad on Tinder. Tutu prepares to go on a cruise. Rafi moves out of sober living and in with Nelson. Season finale(c)

programme.title: Frank's Northern Southern Express

programme.title: Mark's Lunch & Two Cups of Coffee.
programme.desc: Bridgette matches with her estranged Dad on Tinder. Tutu prepares to go on a cruise. Rafi moves out of sober living and in with Nelson. Season finale(c)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up

programme.title: Blue Chips
programme.desc: Championship-winning coach Pete Bell (Nick Nolte) runs the cleanest program in collegiate basketball. When he finds himself on the brink of his first losing season, Bell decides he must make a risky move to protect his job: under-the-table dollars for talent. Betraying his conscience and the trust of his ex-wife (Mary McDonnell), bell signs the nation's blue chips: a farm boy forward (Matt Nover), a playmaking guard from the projects (Penny Hardaway), and Neon Bodeaux (Shaquille O'Neal), a 7-foot slam-dunking phenom from the bayou

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) is a lonely 11-year-old boy who escapes from his bleak reality by glorying in the action adventure movies of his favorite film character, Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). When his best friend, Nick the projectionist, gives him a special ticket to the new Slater film, Danny is magically transported into Jack's world, where the good guys always win. Danny becomes his helper as Jack battles a trio of nefarious bad guys, Benedict (Charles Dance), Vivaldi (Anthony Quinn) and The Ripper (Tom Noonan)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out")

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him

programme.title: Mark's Lunch & Two Cups of Coffee.
programme.desc: Bridgette matches with her estranged Dad on Tinder. Tutu prepares to go on a cruise. Rafi moves out of sober living and in with Nelson. Season finale(c)

programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy

programme.title: 2017 Week 17
programme.desc: This week on INSIDE THE NFL, host James Brown and analysts Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason and Ray Lewis preview the weekend's AFC and NFC Wild Card games. Plus, a visit from CBS news anchor, Buffalo native and Bills superfan Jeff Glor(c)

programme.title: Sniper
programme.desc: Legendary Marine sniper Tom Beckett (Tom Berenger) has an impressive 74 confirmed kills, and is sent to the hostile jungles of Central America to eliminate a dangerous rebel leader and his Colombian drug lord financier. As his spotter, the Pentagon chooses Richard Miller (Billy Zane), a silver-medal marksman aiming for a Washington promotion. Inexperienced and out of his element, Miller is unprepared for anything he'll encounter in the jungle

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) is a lonely 11-year-old boy who escapes from his bleak reality by glorying in the action adventure movies of his favorite film character, Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: A horrifying short story by Stephen King becomes this engrossing chiller about the survivors of a strange, mutating mist that invades a small town and brings with it unspeakable monsters. Thomas Jane, Laurie Holden, Andre Braugher, Marcia Gay Harden and William Sadler star in this film directed by Frank Darabont ("The Shawshank Redemption")

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends becomes the target of a killer. As the body count rises, they contemplate the rules of horror films as they're living in a real-life one

programme.title: Frank's Northern Southern Express
programme.desc: Frank starts a booming import-export business. Fiona considers moving into her own place after Ford shows her a side of Chicago she's never seen. Meanwhile, Lip interviews new sponsors, Ian confronts a pastor trying to "pray the gay away" and Debbie deals with being unemployed while looking for a way to afford school and raise Franny(c)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa is a struggling Philadelphia boxer who is scorned by his gym's owner, patronized by a local loan shark and rebuffed by a shy plain-Jane, whose brother keeps trying to engineer a romantic match. Heavyweight champion Apollo Creed comes up with the Bicentennial gimmick of touting a new fight as the chance for a nobody to become a somebody while planning to easily win the bout himself. But someone forgets to tell Rocky, who trains earnestly for the fight, and comes out swinging(n)

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Before Chuck Wepner (Liev Schreiber) goes fifteen rounds with Muhammed Ali, he's a liquor salesman and father with a modest prizefighting career. His life changes overnight when, in 1975, he is chosen to take on The Greatest in a highly publicized title match. It's the beginning of a wild ride through the exhilarating highs and humbling lows of sudden fame. Elisabeth Moss and Naomi Watts costar(n)

programme.title: Mark's Lunch & Two Cups of Coffee.
programme.desc: Bridgette matches with her estranged Dad on Tinder. Tutu prepares to go on a cruise. Rafi moves out of sober living and in with Nelson. Season finale(n)

programme.title: Extreme Movie
programme.desc: A teenager suffering from the pain of lifelong virginity sets his sexual sights on his school's most popular girl in this raunchy sketch comedy featuring appearances from Michael Cera, Frankie Muniz and Beverly Mitchell(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, Charlie Wilson is a womanizing US congressional representative from Texas who is a member of two major foreign policy and covert-ops committees. After being prodded by his major conservative supporter, Houston Socialite Joanne Herring, Wilson learns about the plight the people are suffering in the brutal Soviet occupation of Afghanistan. With the help of maverick CIA agent Gustav Avrakotos, Wilson dedicates his canny political efforts to supply the Afghan mujahideen with the weapons and support to defeat the Soviet Union(n)

programme.title: Bugsy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel, who runs the rackets in New York along with Meyer Lansky (Ben Kingsley) and Charlie "Lucky" Luciano (Bill Graham). Leaving his family behind, Bugsy is sent by his partners to Los Angeles, where on a movie set he is captivated by the beauty and wit of starlet Virginia Hill (Annette Bening). Although she is the girlfriend of a compatriot, Virginia becomes Bugsy's true pursuit and obsession as he takes over the L.A. rackets(n)

programme.title: 2017 Week 17
programme.desc: This week on INSIDE THE NFL, host James Brown and analysts Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason and Ray Lewis preview the weekend's AFC and NFC Wild Card games. Plus, a visit from CBS news anchor, Buffalo native and Bills superfan Jeff Glor(n)

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Four men trying to escape their pasts drive cattle and live off the land on an open range. When they are threatened by a corrupt lawman, one of the men, a former gunslinger, is forced to take up arms again(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party

Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

Danny becomes his helper as Jack battles a trio of nefarious bad guys, Benedict (Charles Dance), Vivaldi (Anthony Quinn) and The Ripper (Tom Noonan)

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: 14-year old Susan Shawson travels back in time in her building's elevator. Altered by a retired physicist living in her building, it transports her from Philadelphia in 1998 to the same place in 1881. There she meets Victoria Walker, a girl her own age in need of assistance with her own family problems. Gradually discovering the power of her time machine, Susan, Victoria, and her young brother Robert travel back and forth in time and succeed in changing both the past and the future

programme.title: Separated
programme.desc: In this short film, a wind-up toy robot goes on an epic journey to save his better half

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: After losing a son to yet another shark attack, Ellen Brody, (LORRAINE GARY), attempts to resurrect her life away from Amity by joining her marine biologist son Michael (LANCE CUEST), in the Bahamas - where great whites have never been known to venture. One day, a mysterious man named Hoagie (MICHAEL CAINE) enters her life, and a romance begins to build. Their courtship is abruptly disrupted by events that threaten their lives, and nearly destroy, the remainder of Ellen Brody's small family

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: At Sea World of Florida, an ingenious new Undersea Kingdom is about to open. A maze of transparent tunnels, beneath the park's lagoon, takes visitors through a teeming world of exotic sea life. There is also an uninvited guest however. Entering through a damaged sea gate, separating the park from the ocean, a great white shark becomes trapped in the lagoon. Panic spreads through the holiday crowd. In a primal frenzy, the shark devours anything which prevents its escape

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water! The beach-goers of Amity are threatened again by a giant, man-eating shark in this thrilling sequel to Spielberg's masterpiece. When signs of a new man-eater begin to wash up, Police Chief Brody must convince the town of the danger and kill the monster. Oscar nominee Roy Scheider returns along with the famous John Williams score

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police (Roy Scheider), a young marine biologist (Richard Dreyfuss) and a grizzled shark hunter (Robert Shaw) embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure.
