Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Series premiere. Dr. William Masters (Michael Sheen), Washington University's foremost OB/GYN, runs a successful medical practice by day and conducts a secret study of human sexuality by night. Former nightclub singer Virginia Johnson (Lizzy Caplan) joins the hospital secretarial staff and proves herself to be an asset to Masters' work(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Race to Space
programme.desc: On the heels of Masters' proposal that they participate in the study, Johnson considers the best course of action to keep her job - only to find she no longer has one. The study is forced out of the hospital and Masters believes Johnson is to blame. Masters moves the study to a brothel(c)

programme.title: Standard Deviation
programme.desc: Masters and Johnson continue their study in the brothel but skewed data makes research difficult. At the hospital, Johnson is surprised to learn that a distinguished new doctor on the OB/GYN floor is a woman who has no interest in female solidarity. Meanwhile, Libby struggles to conceive and Dr. Haas gets the case of a lifetime - a woman pregnant with quadruplets(c)

programme.title: Thank You For Coming
programme.desc: With the study back in the hospital, Masters and Johnson recruit new participants on campus. Johnson is shocked when her ex-husband George, who's crashing on her couch, wants to sign up. Masters' mother comes to visit, but her new take on life stirs up painful childhood memories. Libby's attempt at playing matchmaker with Virginia and Ethan doesn't go smoothly(c)

programme.title: Catherine
programme.desc: When Masters and Johnson expand the study to include couples, they discover that the science of sex is easily complicated by the mystery of attraction. Johnson tries to connect with her son. Masters experiences anxiety about becoming a father. Dr. Haas learns that dating the provost's daughter could impact his career(c)

programme.title: Brave New World
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the miscarriage, Libby and Masters travel to Miami for some much needed rest and relaxation, but Masters is drawn back into his work by a sexually adventurous couple next door. Alone in the hospital, Virginia enlists Jane in an effort to debunk Freud's theory that one kind of female orgasm is better than another. Langham finds an unlikely cure for his sexual dysfunction in Margaret Scully(c)

programme.title: All Together Now
programme.desc: Masters and Johnson continue their sexual response study - now as participants - but Johnson fears their work may be interfering with Masters' home life. Libby pressures Dr. Haas to resume her fertility treatments in secret. Meanwhile, Haas struggles to let go of feelings for Virginia as his relationship with Vivian deepens. And Margaret Scully, caught in her infidelity, confronts her husband on the mounting problems in their marriage(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Love and Marriage
programme.desc: Masters and Johnson decide that the best way to record their study findings is to film them, but to do so they have to enlist outside help. Johnson redoubles her efforts to get a college degree, only to find that Dr. DePaul's Basic Anatomy class is a requirement. Meanwhile, Haas and Langham - both unsure in their relationships - convince each other of the merits of being a married man. And after Margaret catches him in a compromising position, Scully takes drastic steps to control his sexual impulses(c)

programme.title: Involuntary
programme.desc: Masters and Johnson convince Lester and Jane that their filmed footage won't cross the line into pornography. Haas and Vivian's plans for a church wedding get sidetracked when Haas reveals he's Jewish. Libby keeps her pregnancy a secret from Masters while encouraging him to mend his relationship with his mother. But Estabrooks discovers just how intimate Masters and Johnson's relationship has become during a late night visit to the hospital(c)

programme.title: Fallout
programme.desc: The hospital takes part in a nationwide civil defense drill, and the heightened atmosphere escalates conflicts among the staff. A former study participant reveals she's pregnant and wants to know the identity of the father. Masters and Johnson butt heads on whether to maintain study confidentiality or take responsibility. Haas learns he's been denied a future job at the hospital and assumes his breakup with Vivian is to blame. Margaret Scully seeks answers about her husband's sexuality from an unlikely source(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Phallic Victories
programme.desc: Masters accepts Libby's offer to help compile the study work, but when he sees another doctor's presentation put his colleagues to sleep, he becomes determined to grab their attention - even if it means pushing through provocative, but incomplete, research. Dr. DePaul and Johnson travel to a medical convention and DePaul opens up on why her work on the Pap smear is so important. Virginia-s ex-husband George returns to find Ethan Haas playing father to his children(n)

programme.title: Manhigh
programme.desc: Masters' work on human sexuality culminates with a hospital-wide presentation of his and Johnson's research findings. But when Masters attempts to push the envelope, the doctors' response is not what he had hoped. Meanwhile, Haas entertains a job offer at another hospital and considers what a move would mean for his relationship with Virginia. Scully pursues electroshock treatment with the hope of curing his homosexuality, but Margaret has second thoughts about the risks involved. Season finale(n)

Shane, a Jersey boy with big dreams, crosses the river in hopes of finding a more exciting life at Studio 54. When Steve Rubell, the mastermind behind the infamous disco, plucks Shane from the sea of faces, Shane lands a coveted job(n)

programme.title: De-Lovely
programme.desc: Kevin Kline stars in this acclaimed biography of famed songwriter Cole Porter, whose rise to fame and fortune coincides with his marriage to Linda Thomas (Ashley Judd), a woman who will love him for life despite knowing that her husband is gay. Jonathan Pryce costars in this Golden Globe®-nominated musical drama that also features appearances from several real-life musicians(n)

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Lucky Them
programme.desc: Toni Collette stars as veteran rock journalist who has one last chance to prove her value to her magazine's editor by going on a no-stone unturned search to discover what really happened to a long lost rock god, who also happens to be her ex-boyfriend. She teams up with an eccentric amateur documentary filmmaker and they hit the road to lay old ghosts to rest and find some answers. Also stars Oliver Platt(n)

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: Sins of Our Youth
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally kill a young boy while firing assault weapons recreationally. In their moment of desperation, paranoia and fear that their lives are over, the youths drunkenly construct a chilling plan reminiscent of a video game plot: they will hunt each other down until only one is left standing. Now, with the clock ticking, each young man must come to terms with their actions and decide how far they are willing to go(n)

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out")(n)

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about two engaged sophisticates who fall in love on an ocean voyage, and agree to meet atop the Empire State Building six months later to prove that their love affair was more than a shipboard romance. programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: Set in the year 2018, John Connor leads the human resistance against the computer network Skynet as the machines grow more aggressive than ever before. As John and Marcus venture into the mechanical heart of Skynet's operations, they make a terrifying discovery about the potential fate of the human race. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Platoon

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation

programme.title: The Ring

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground

The others, along with returning Tee and Johnny, set up a crowdfunding page to and raise the cash to buy Ashdene Ridge themselves. The YP are resigned to their fate, all but Tyler, who faces a race against time to expose Mr. Umbleby. Trying to prove his innocence, Alex faces an uphill battle for redemption.
